character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Sometimes Mhorriníon is seen riding a giant raven named Dubh'neach into battle. This raven is the only one of its kind that is known to the inhabitants of Albion, his origin a mystery only Mhorriníon herself knows the answer to.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: A veces, se ve a Mhorriníon montando un cuervo gigante llamado Dubh'neach en la batalla. Este cuervo es el único de su tipo que conocen los habitantes de Albión, su origen es un misterio del que solo Morrigan sabe la respuesta.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: No one knows the full extent of her powers, but all agree it may be better not to see her unleash it.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Nadie conoce el alcance total de sus poderes, pero todos están de acuerdo en que quizás sea mejor no verla desatarlos.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: Ravens will always heed Mhorriníon's call, even if it costs their lives.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Los cuervos siempre escucharán la llamada de Mhorriníon, incluso si les cuesta la vida.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The tribes of Albion breed a hardy race of horses, surefooted and fast. But only wealthy warriors may be able to afford to ride into battle.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las tribus de Albión crían una raza de caballos robustos, rápidos y firmes. Pero solo los guerreros más ricos pueden permitirse el lujo de cabalgar a la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The tribes of Albion breed a hardy race of horses, surefooted and fast. But only wealthy warriors may be able to afford to ride into battle.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las tribus de Albión crían una raza de caballos robustos, rápidos y firmes. Pero solo los guerreros más ricos pueden permitirse el lujo de cabalgar a la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The tribes of Albion breed a hardy race of horses, surefooted and fast. But only wealthy warriors may be able to afford to ride into battle.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las tribus de Albión crían una raza de caballos robustos, rápidos y firmes. Pero solo los guerreros más ricos pueden permitirse el lujo de cabalgar a la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_m.value_original: The tribes of Albion breed a hardy race of horses, surefooted and fast. But only wealthy warriors may be able to afford to ride into battle.
character_skills_localised_description_m.value_translated: Las tribus de Albión crían una raza de caballos robustos, rápidos y firmes. Pero solo los guerreros más ricos pueden permitirse el lujo de cabalgar a la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_o.value_original: Truthsayers don't write down their knowledge. The secrets are passed from the master's mouth to the pupil's ear, which introduces mistakes and misunderstandings. This causes the magic of the Truthsayers to be less reliable, but some changes introduced this way have unexpected beneficial side-effects.
character_skills_localised_description_o.value_translated: Los Arúspices no escriben sus conocimientos. Los secretos pasan de la boca del maestro al oído del alumno, lo que suele provocar errores y malentendidos. Esto hace que la magia de los Arúspices sea menos confiable que otras, pero algunos cambios introducidos de esta manera tienen efectos secundarios beneficiosos inesperados.

character_skills_localised_description_s.value_original: This Overking emerged from the Sessair tribe and has been shaped by their aggressive, savage fighting style and tactics.
character_skills_localised_description_s.value_translated: Este Líder Guerrero surgió de la tribu Sessair y ha sido moldeado por su estilo y tácticas de lucha agresivas y salvajes.

character_skills_localised_description_s.value_original: Most of the human warriors of the warband have been drawn from the Sessair tribe and fight in the style unique to the Sessair.
character_skills_localised_description_s.value_translated: La mayoría de los guerreros proceden de la tribu Sessair y luchan con el estilo exclusivo de los Sessair.

character_skills_localised_description_s.value_original: Often outnumbered and outmatched in terms of individual strength, the warriors of Albions are skilled ambushers.
character_skills_localised_description_s.value_translated: A menudo superados en número y en términos de fuerza individual, los guerreros de Albión son hábiles emboscadores.

character_skills_localised_description_s.value_original: Truthsayers have mastered the ability to call ever more terrifying constructs of rotten wood, mud and bones from the swamps to bolster their ranks.
character_skills_localised_description_s.value_translated: Los que Arúspices han dominado la capacidad de invocar bestias cada vez más aterradoras de madera podrida, barro y huesos de los pantanos para reforzar sus filas.

character_skills_localised_description_t.value_original: The first Truthsayers have been taught by the Old Ones themselves. Precious little is left of these original teachings, but even a fraction of this magical knowledge is still potent.
character_skills_localised_description_t.value_translated: Los primeros Arúspices fueron instruidos por los mismísimos Ancestrales. Queda muy poco de aquellas enseñanzas originales, pero incluso una fracción de aquel conocimiento mágico sigue siendo potente.

character_skills_localised_description_t.value_original: The voice of the truthsayer is heard in the minds of his warriors, invoking their sense of honor and giving them unwavering hope even in the most desperate of situations.
character_skills_localised_description_t.value_translated: La voz del Arúspice se escucha en la mente de sus guerreros, invocando su sentido del honor y dándoles una esperanza inquebrantable incluso en las situaciones más desesperadas.

character_skills_localised_description_t.value_original: Dying Warriors are granted a second chance as the spell of the truthsayer mends their deadly wounds and allows them to return to battle.
character_skills_localised_description_t.value_translated: Los guerreros moribundos tienen una segunda oportunidad, ya que el hechizo del arúspice cura sus heridas mortales y les permite regresar a la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_t.value_original: A barrier of shimmering light protects the warriors from magic and flame alike.
character_skills_localised_description_t.value_translated: Una barrera de luz brillante protege a los guerreros de la magia y las llamas por igual.

character_skills_localised_description_t.value_original: The mage calls upon the gods of hunting and battle to grant his allies additional strength and skill.
character_skills_localised_description_t.value_translated: El mago invoca a los dioses de la caza y la batalla para que otorguen a sus aliados fuerza y habilidad adicionales.

character_skills_localised_description_t.value_original: The booming voice of the truthsayer fills the mind of an enemy, robbing them of the concentration necessary to operate ranged weapons.
character_skills_localised_description_t.value_translated: La voz atronadora del Arúspice resuena en la mente del enemigo, robándole la concentración necesaria para manejar armas a distancia.

character_skills_localised_description_t.value_original: The Truthsayer conjures a flock of magic birds which will fly straight into the enemy formations, bringing doom to those they collide with.
character_skills_localised_description_t.value_translated: El Arúspice conjura una bandada de pájaros mágicos que vuelan directamente hacia las formaciones enemigas, llevando la perdición a aquellos con los que chocan.

character_skills_localised_description_t.value_original: The Druids are not only mages, but also religious leaders. This one follows Carnuos, the god of the hunt.
character_skills_localised_description_t.value_translated: Los druidas no solo son magos, sino también líderes religiosos. Este sigue a Carnuos, el dios de la caza.

character_skills_localised_description_t.value_original: The Druids are not only mages, but also religious leaders. This one follows Ishernos, the goddess of the earth.
character_skills_localised_description_t.value_translated: Los druidas no solo son magos, sino también líderes religiosos. Este sigue a Ishernos, la diosa de la tierra.

character_skills_localised_description_t.value_original: The Druids are not only mages, but also religious leaders. This one follows Choteich, the god of the sun.
character_skills_localised_description_t.value_translated: Los druidas no solo son magos, sino también líderes religiosos. Este sigue a Choteich, el dios del sol.

character_skills_localised_description_t.value_original: The magic of Albion conjures the famous mists of its homeland, enveloping allied warriors, protecting them from projectiles.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Chariot races are a favourite pastime of young Albion nobility - the experience gained serves them well on the battlefield too.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Las carreras de carros son uno de los pasatiempos favoritos de la joven nobleza de Albión; la experiencia adquirida también les sirve en el campo de batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The inhabitants of Albion fight not only monsters but often enough they fight each other or intruders from the outside. Some display an outright disturbing talent fighting this type of foe.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Los habitantes de Albión luchan no solo contra monstruos, sino que a menudo luchan entre sí o contra intrusos del exterior. Algunos muestran un talento absolutamente perturbador en la lucha contra este tipo de enemigos.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The tribes of Albion breed a hardy race of horses, surefooted and fast. But only wealthy warriors may be able to afford to ride into battle.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Las tribus de Albión crían una raza de caballos robustos, rápidos y firmes. Pero solo los guerreros más ricos pueden permitirse el lujo de cabalgar a la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The tribes of Albion raid each other all the time. Those who are successful can gain the favour of their tribe....and the hate of the others.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Las tribus de Albión se atacan entre sí todo el tiempo. Aquellos que tienen éxito pueden ganarse el favor de su tribu... y el odio de los demás.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The bogs of Albion are always contested. Those who keep the Fimir from crawling out of their holes deserve the highest respect.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Los pantanos de Albión siempre están en disputa. Aquellos que evitan que los Fimir salgan arrastrándose de sus agujeros merecen el mayor respeto.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Albion is a dangerous land, most of its inhabitants will never stray too far from their tribe to avoid the dangers of the blighted landscape. Those who brave the dangerous wilds and return to tell the tale have the potential to become legends.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Albión es una tierra peligrosa, la mayoría de sus habitantes nunca se alejarán demasiado de su tribu para evitar los peligros del paraje asolado. Aquellos que desafían las peligrosas tierras salvajes y regresan para contar la historia tienen el potencial de convertirse en leyendas.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Prioritizing the path of the Warrior, this Druidic Priestess is a better fighter than others - but her abilities to weave magic suffered in return.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Santificando el camino del Guerrero, esta Sacerdotisa Druídica es mejor luchadora que los demás, a cambio sus habilidades para tejer la magia se han resentido.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: There is much to be gained by letting the strange power of the Wyrd run free through the Druid's body, but there is also a prize to pay.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Se puede ganar mucho dejando que el extraño poder del Wyrd corra libremente a través del cuerpo del druida, a cambio hay un precio que pagar.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: The tribes of Albion breed a hardy race of horses, surefooted and fast. But only wealthy warriors may be able to afford to ride into battle.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Las tribus de Albión crían una raza de caballos robustos, rápidos y firmes. Pero solo los guerreros más ricos pueden permitirse el lujo de cabalgar a la batalla.

character_skills_localised_description_w.value_original: Adorned with similar runes as the famous Ogham stones, the body of this Druid binds magic to protect those around her from the harms it can bring.
character_skills_localised_description_w.value_translated: Adornado con runas similares a las famosas piedras Ogham, el cuerpo de este druida une la magia para proteger a quienes lo rodean de los daños que puede ocasionar.

character_skills_localised_name_dural_lo.value_original: Loremaster of the Lore of Truthsayers
character_skills_localised_name_dural_lo.value_translated: Maestro del Saber de los Arúspices

character_skills_localised_name_elo_mons.value_translated: Monstruos de la Isla de las Brumas

character_skills_localised_name_fir_lead.value_translated: Líder guerrero del Dominio de Abeto

character_trait_levels_colour_text_ovn_a.value_original: The Raven-Queen is defeated, for now. When she returns, her wrath will be great.

character_trait_levels_colour_text_ovn_b.value_original: With Dural Durak's defeat, his enemies have finally taken from him the secrets and mysteries of Albion.

character_trait_levels_explanation_text_.value_translated: Ha derrotado a Mhorriníon la Reina Cuervo

culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_original: Study Ruins||You will be presented with a puzzle to solve; you will be rewarded if you successfully decipher it.
culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_translated: Estudiar Ruinas||Se te presentará un rompecabezas para resolver; serás recompensado si lo descifras con éxito.

culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_original: Settle||Your people have a new home.
Do Nothing||Leave the settlement as it stands.
culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_translated: No hacer nada||Dejar el asentamiento en paz.

culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_original: Collect Tithe & Occupy||You gain wealth from the tithe, but buildings in the settlement are damaged. All captives are converted, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is greatly reduced, and your diplomatic relations with the previous owner also suffer greatly.
culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_translated: Cobrar diezmo y ocupar||Los diezmos te ofrecen riqueza, pero los edificios del asentamiento quedarán dañados. Todos los cautivos son convertidos, el nivel de [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} queda reducido y tus relaciones diplomáticas con el anterior propietario se resienten en gran medida.

culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_original: Cleanse with Fire||All buildings are destroyed and the settlement is torched.
culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_translated: Purificar con fuego||Todos los edificios son destruidos y el asentamiento es incendiado.

culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_original: Resettle||With no regions currently under your control, you have the option to settle your people here.
culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_translated: Reasentarse||Sin regiones actualmente bajo tu control, tienes la opción de dejar de emigrar y hacer que tu ejército se asiente aquí.

culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_original: Demand Offerings||You do not capture the settlement but instead take offerings in the form of gold and damage buildings. All captives are converted, [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} is reduced, and the previous owners will like you a lot less.
culture_settlement_occupation_options_to.value_translated: Exigir Ofrendas||No capturarás el asentamiento, sino que reclamarás ofrendas en forma de oro y dañarás sus edificios. Todos los prisioneros son convertidos. El nivel de [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]{{tr:hp_campaign_public_order_term}} se reducirá y su antiguo señor te empezará a odiar.

cultures_frontend_description_ovn_albion.value_original: Shrouded in an impenetrable magical mist, far off the western coast of Norsca lies the island of Albion. Chosen by the Old Ones in ancient times to be one of their strongholds, Albion is now ruled by the Truthsayers, an ancient order of Human mystics who rule over the primitive tribals of the island. The Men of Albion have been led by the Truthsayers since the Great Cataclysm, rarely venturing outside their shrouded island, but valiantly defending it from those that managed to pierce the shroud, fighting with fierce determination against the servants of the Ruinous Powers and the curruptiing nature of Chaos, always trying to seep into their homeland. The hosts of Albion are heavily geared towards offensive melee combat, with little ranged options, fast cavalry and a variety of monstrous units. Most Human troops are protected by magical Woad Paint, providing some missile resistance when the Winds of Magic are high. Most Albion units also descend  into a War Fury when in melee, but, except for the most elite units, this lack of professonalism means that they will be quicker to flee battlee when it turns against them.
cultures_frontend_description_ovn_albion.value_translated: Envuelta en una impenetrable niebla mágica, lejos de la costa occidental de Norsca se encuentra la isla de Albión. Elegida por los Ancestrales en la antigüedad para ser uno de sus bastiones, Albión está ahora habitada por los Arúspices, una antigua orden de humanos místicos que gobiernan a las primitivas tribus de la isla. Estos Arúspices han liderado a las gentes de Albión desde el Gran Cataclismo, aventurándose raramente fuera de su brumosa isla, pero defendiéndola valientemente de aquellos que consiguieron traspasar la niebla, luchando con feroz determinación contra los sirvientes de los Poderes Ruinosos y la naturaleza corruptora del Caos, siempre intentando filtrarse en su hogar. Las huestes de Albión están fuertemente orientadas al combate cuerpo a cuerpo ofensivo, con pocas opciones a distancia, caballería rápida y una gran variedad de unidades monstruosas. La mayoría de las tropas Humanas están protegidas con Pintura Isatide mágica, que proporciona cierta resistencia a los proyectiles cuando los Vientos de la Mágia son altos. La mayoría de las unidades de Albión también entran en una Furia de Guerra cuando están en combate cuerpo a cuerpo, pero, salvo las unidades de élite, esta falta de profesionalidad significa que huirán más rápido de la batalla cuando ésta se vuelva contra ello.

custom_loading_screen_components_localis.value_original: Albion is a small, windswept island off the coast of Norsca in the Great Ocean. It is said that it rains every day in Albion, the islands are shrouded in mist and heavy fog and the land is predominantly bogs, marshes and fens. This damp and gloomy environment is inhabited by tribes of woad-wearing humans, led by Truthsayers, guardians of the mysterious Ogham Stones, and inhabited by creatures such as Giants and the strange Fimir.
custom_loading_screen_components_localis.value_translated: Albión es una pequeña isla, azotada siempre por el viento, situada frente a la costa de Norsca, en el Gran Océano. Se dice que llueve todos los días, las islas están continuamente envueltas en brumas y espesas nieblas y la tierra es básicamente, pantanos, pantanos y más pantanos. Este húmedo y lúgubre paraje está habitado por tribus humanas que visten pieles y se cubren de pinturas tribales color añil que crean con una planta conocida como Isatide. Están liderados por los Arúspices, guardianes de las misteriosas Piedras Ogham y comparten isla con criaturas como Gigantes y los extraños Fimir.

dilemmas_localised_description_ovn_dilem.value_original: The High Druid of Albion has returned from his journey to Beast Peaks and brings grave visions of impending doom. A prophecy the Murder-Queen knows all too well, with her timely arrival to ward off the Chaos Invasion. Between them, one must lead our defences and the other be the overseer in the restoration of the Waystones.
dilemmas_localised_description_ovn_dilem.value_translated: El Alto Druida de Albión ha regresado de su viaje a los Picos de las Bestias y trae consigo graves visiones de una inminente fatalidad. Una profecía que la Reina Cuervo conoce muy bien, con su oportuna llegada para evitar la Invasión del Caos. Uno debe liderar nuestras defensas y el otro debe supervisar la restauración de los Círculos de Piedras.

dilemmas_localised_description_rhox_albi.value_original: The journey may have only just begun, but the Truthsayers demand results. To aid you, the High Druid sends word of warriors ready to join the Ravenqueen Host.\\n\\nThe four main clans of Albion each has warriors ready – choose which clan to honour.

The Overking's and Petty Chieftain's of Albion are mightily impressed by your deeds against Chaos hordes. They are therefore offering great warriors to swell the ranks of the Ravenqueen Host.\\n\\nThe four main clans of Albion each has warriors ready – choose which clan to honour.

With your remarkable progress in the war against Chaos the Shadows are lifting. The Truthsayer Council now ensures that only the most veteran warriors are sent to bolster the Ravenqueen Host.\\n\\nThe four main clans of Albion each has warriors ready – choose which clan to honour.

dilemmas_localised_title_ovn_dilemma_alb.value_translated: Búsqueda de la visión de Dural Durak

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: May this forge our weapons in which to strike down chaos.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Que esto forje nuestras armas para abatir el caos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: The crows grow jealous of your generosity
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Los cuervos se ponen celosos de tu generosidad

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: You have the Murder Queens blessings.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Tienes la bendición de la Reina Cuervo.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: Forgive me Ishernos, we must accept.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Perdóname Ishernos, debemos aceptar.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: On another day, my ravens would pluck your eyes.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Otro día, mis cuervos te arrancarían los ojos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: I seen no other path, as dark it is.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: No he visto otro camino, por muy oscuro que sea.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: The Raven Queen accepts.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: La Reina Cuervo acepta.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: We shall seal this deal before the altars of our gods.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Sellaremos este trato ante los altares de nuestros dioses.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: Go now with Ghyran’s blessings.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Ve ahora con las bendiciones de Ghyran.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: May my ravens guide you safely home.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Que mis cuervos te guíen a salvo a casa.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: The ravens caw in delight.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Los cuervos graznan con alegría.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: I’ve sent ravens of these good tidings so all may revel.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: He enviado cuervos con estas buenas noticias para que todos se deleiten.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: May this be beginning of the end of chaos.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Que esto sea el principio del fin del caos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: You will incur the wrath of the Murder Queen.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Incurrirás en la ira de la Reina Cuervo.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: May ravens pluck your newborns from their cradles.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Que los cuervos arranquen a tus recién nacidos de sus cunas.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: The ravens already told me of your treachery.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Los cuervos ya me han hablado de tu traición.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: I will see revenge is served.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Me encargaré de que se cumpla la venganza.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: May ravens darken your skies.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Que los cuervos oscurezcan tus cielos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: You reject the Phantom Queen.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Rechazas a la Reina Fantasma.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: The ravens will feast well on your entrails.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Los cuervos se darán un buen festín con tus entrañas.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: You dare face the Raven Queen.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Te atreves a enfrentarte a la Reina Cuervo.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_original: I will only cease when you have fallen.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ac.value_translated: Sólo cesaré cuando hayas caído.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ca.value_original: I fear you work against us.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ca.value_translated: Me temo que trabajas contra nosotros.
La Reina Cuervo, lo sabe todo.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ca.value_original: The ravens speak of your misdeeds.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ca.value_translated: Los cuervos hablan de tus fechorías.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_original: Let us rid this world of the shadows.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_translated: Libremos a este mundo de las sombras.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_original: This maybe our only chance, surely you must see this.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_translated: Esta puede ser nuestra única oportunidad, deberías verlo.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_original: Let our flocks join and wreak glorious havoc.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_translated: Dejemos que nuestras bandadas se unan y causen gloriosos estragos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_original: An offering to appease my vengeance.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_translated: Una ofrenda para apaciguar mi venganza.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_original: If not, we may falter and who do you think chaos will come for next.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_translated: Si no, podemos flaquear y quién crees que será el próximo en llegar el caos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_original: Aid us as we have aided the world for so long.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_De.value_translated: Ayúdanos como hemos ayudado al mundo durante tanto tiempo.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_original: Let me wash your armour while we discuss my proposal.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_translated: Déjame lavar tu armadura mientras discutimos mi propuesta.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_original: Light can shine even in the darkest of places.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_translated: La luz puede brillar incluso en los lugares más oscuros.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_original: May our differences not cause discord.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_translated: Que nuestras diferencias no causen discordia.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_original: The Murder Queen has a proposal.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_translated: La Reina Cuervo tiene una propuesta.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_original: My ravens wait for your answer?
What say you to the Phantom Queen?
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_translated: ¿Qué le dices a la Reina Asesina?

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_original: Help us rid chaos from this world.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_translated: Ayúdanos a eliminar el caos de este mundo.
Esto sirve a nuestras dos causas.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_original: Come stand on the shoulders of giants.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Ge.value_translated: Ponte en pie en los hombros de los gigantes.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_original: Speak, before I command my ravens to feed on your eyes.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_translated: Habla, antes de que ordene a mis cuervos que se alimenten de tus ojos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_original: Come, let me wash your armour while we speak.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_translated: Ven, déjame lavar tu armadura mientras hablamos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_original: You dare speak to me, the Murder Queen.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_translated: Te atreves a hablar conmigo, la Reina Cuervo.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_original: The ravens spoke of your arrival.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_translated: Los cuervos hablaron de tu llegada.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_original: What have you to say to the Murder Queen.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_translated: ¿Qué tienes que decir a la Reina Cuervo?

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_original: May our fire warm you on this stormy eve.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_translated: Que nuestro fuego te caliente en esta víspera tormentosa.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_original: You are warmly received in the Raven court.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_translated: Eres calurosamente recibido en la corte de los Cuervos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_original: Mhorriníon the Murder Queen, welcomes you as friend.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_translated: Mhorriníon, la Reina Cuervo, te da la bienvenida como amigo.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_original: The ravens caw in delight at your arrival.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Gr.value_translated: Los cuervos graznan encantados con tu llegada.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_original: Chaos surges, we must work together.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_translated: El caos surge, debemos trabajar juntos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_original: The ravens foretell of our doom, we must act now!
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_translated: Los cuervos predicen nuestra perdición, ¡debemos actuar ahora!

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_original: As one, we will destroy chaos.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_translated: Como uno, vamos a destruir el caos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_original: So you may repent the corruption.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_translated: Para que te arrepientas de la corrupción.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_original: A gift to weather the storm.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_translated: Un regalo para capear el temporal.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_original: The crows weeped as the gold left.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_translated: Los cuervos lloraron cuando el oro se fue.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_original: The ravens circle, ready to feast.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_translated: Los cuervos dan vueltas, listos para el festín.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_original: May we fight and die alongside each other.
They will sing great songs and poems of our exploits.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_translated: Cantarán grandes canciones y poemas de nuestras hazañas.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_original: Let us cease this fighting, there are others that incur my vengeance.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_translated: Dejemos esta lucha, hay otros que incurren en mi venganza.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_original: Surely you grow tired of the ravens.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_translated: Seguro que te cansas de los cuervos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_original: There are others you must destroy if not to be destroyed.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Of.value_translated: Hay otros que deben destruir si no quieren ser destruidos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: It is not time to reunite Albion under one banner.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: No es hora de reunir a Albión bajo un solo estandarte.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: Rebuild the waystones and we will continue to shield you.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: Reconstruye las piedras del camino y seguiremos protegiéndote.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: You must follow your own path.
Not until the ravens have your eyes.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: No hasta que los cuervos tengan tus ojos.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: Not until I see vengeance served.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: No hasta que vea la venganza servida.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: I will rid your taint from this world.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: Libraré tu mancha de este mundo.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: May you be forever lost in the mist.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: Que te pierdas para siempre en la niebla.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: Get out, before I strike you down and my ravens feast!
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: ¡Salid, antes de que os derribe y mis cuervos se den un festín!

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: This does not serve our interests.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: Esto no sirve a nuestros intereses.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: The ravens speak of an ulterior motive in your proposal.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: Los cuervos hablan de un motivo oculto en tu propuesta.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: I Mhorriníon the Murder Queen, must decline.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: Yo Mhorriníon la Reina Cuervo, debo declinar.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: I have read the ravens entrails. It speaks of a dark omen.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: He leído las entrañas de los cuervos. Hablan de un oscuro presagio.
Ishernos nos guía a otra parte.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_original: Unfortunately we can’t agree to that.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Re.value_translated: Desafortunadamente no podemos estar de acuerdo con eso.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Wa.value_original: My people flock to my banner to see your end.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Wa.value_translated: Mi gente acude a mi estandarte para ver tu fin.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Wa.value_original: You are tainted by chaos, therefore you must be destroyed.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Wa.value_translated: Estás contaminado por el caos, por lo tanto debes ser destruido.

diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Wa.value_original: I will slit your belly, your soldiers bellies and let the ravens feast on your entrails.
diplomacy_strings_string_AlbionRQ_Dip_Wa.value_translated: Cortaré tu vientre, el de tus soldados y dejaré que los cuervos se den un festín con tus entrañas.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_original: The hands are there for friendship, the gold is there for more.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_translated: Las manos están ahí para la amistad, el oro está ahí para más.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_original: May you live to be 100 years with one extra year to repent.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_translated: Que vivas hasta los 100 años, y un año más para arrepentirte.
Tienes las bendiciones de los druidas.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_original: May the earth mother forgive me, we accept.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_translated: Que La Madre Tierra me perdone, aceptamos.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_original: Dark times call for unpleasant decisions.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_translated: Los tiempos oscuros exigen decisiones desagradables.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_original: If this will make you leave, then so be it.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_translated: Si esto te hará marcharte, que así sea.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_original: The tribes can live with this.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_translated: Las tribus pueden vivir con esto.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_original: The earth mother smiles upon this agreement, friend.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_translated: La Madre sonríe ante este acuerdo, amigo.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_original: May your day be touched by Ranald’s luck.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Acce.value_translated: Que tu día sea tocado por la suerte de Ranald.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_original: You are as wise as the Druids.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_translated: Eres tan sabio como los druidas.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_original: The shadows may be stopped yet.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_translated: Las sombras pueden detenerse de momento.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_original: It's no use giving good advice unless you have the wisdom to go with it.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_translated: De nada sirve recibir un buen consejo si no tienes la sabiduría para seguirlo.
Las sombras se hacen más grandes.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_original: Remember my friend, that knowledge is stronger than memory, and we should not trust the weaker.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_translated: Recuerda, amigo mío, que el conocimiento es más fuerte que la memoria y no debemos confiar en los más débiles.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_original: May the holes in your nets be no larger than the fish in it.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_translated: Espero los agujeros de tus redes no sean más grandes que los peces que hay en ellas.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_original: May you drown in the bogs.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_translated: Ojalá te ahogues en los pantanos.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_original: You reject the wisdom of the Truthsayers.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_translated: Rechazas la sabiduría de los arúspices.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_original: Sometimes one day changes everything; sometimes years change nothing.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_translated: A veces, un día lo cambia todo; a veces los años no cambian nada.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_original: We beat our swords upon our shields. To no beast or man shall we ever yield to.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_translated: Golpeamos nuestras espadas sobre nuestros escudos. Jamás nos rendiremos ante ninguna bestia o hombre.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_original: We will call the giants to construct stone circles for your arrival.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Ackn.value_translated: Llamaremos a los gigantes para que construyan círculos de piedra para tu llegada.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Canc.value_original: Always remember to forget the troubles that passed away. But never forget to remember the blessings that come each day.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Canc.value_translated: Recuerda siempre olvidar los problemas pasados. Pero nunca olvides recordar las bendiciones que llegan a diario.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Canc.value_original: You should never be ashamed to admit you have been wrong. It only proves you are wiser today than yesterday.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Canc.value_translated: Nunca deberías avergonzarte de admitir que te has equivocado. Solo demuestra que hoy eres más sabio que ayer.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Canc.value_original: A Truthsayer never tells a lie - only where the truth won't fit.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Canc.value_translated: Un Arúspice nunca miente, solo donde la verdad no encaja.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_original: A kind word never broke anyone's mouth.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_translated: Una palabra amable nunca le rompió la boca a nadie.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_original: Your battles inspired me - not the obvious battles but those that were fought and won inside your head.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_translated: Tus batallas me inspiran, no las batallas obvias, sino las que peleas y ganas dentro de tu cabeza.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_original: May we extinguish the shadows from this world.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_translated: Ojalá extingamos las sombras de este mundo.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_original: The weak exist to nurture the strong. It is the way of nature.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_translated: Los débiles existen para nutrir a los fuertes. Es el camino de la naturaleza.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_original: If only wishing it made it so.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_translated: Si tan solo desearlo lo hiciera real.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_original: Forgetting a debt doesn’t mean it’s paid. The Ogham stones saved the world, it is time you make a contribution.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Dema.value_translated: Olvidar una deuda no significa que esté pagada. Las piedras Ogham salvaron al mundo, es hora de que hagas una contribución.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_original: If you give this to us willingly, we will not have to take it in other ways.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_translated: Si nos das esto voluntariamente, no tendremos que tomarlo de otra manera.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_original: You should be grateful that we came to speak words instead of letting our weapons do the talking.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_translated: Debería estar agradecido de que hayamos venido a conversar en lugar de dejar que nuestras armas hablen por nosotros.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_original: The horned god decided that you are unworthy of being prey, as long as you willingly give up what we require.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_translated: La Madre ha decidido que no eres digno de ser una presa, siempre que renuncies voluntariamente a lo que necesitamos.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_original: May the sun shine through the gloom of despair.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_translated: Que el sol brille en la penumbra de la desesperación.
Sométete a la sabiduría de los arúspices.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_original: The earth mother’s gifts are plentiful this season. How about both sides share what they got?
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_translated: Los regalos de la madre tierra han sido abundantes esta temporada. ¿Qué tal si ambas partes compartimos lo que obtuvimos?

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_original: Our goals align, we should deepen our cooperation.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_translated: Nuestros objetivos se alinean, debemos profundizar en nuestra cooperación.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gene.value_original: Friends of Albion, we shall prosper together

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_original: Speak, before the giants crush your bones.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_translated: Habla, antes de que los gigantes aplasten tus huesos.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_original: The mists are supposed to keep the likes of you from our sacred lands. Leave to whence you came, while you still can.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_translated: Se supone que las nieblas alejan a personas como tú de nuestras tierras sagradas. Vete por donde has venido, mientras puedas.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_original: You reek of Be'lakor’s foul influence, dark emissary.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_translated: Apestas a la repugnante influencia de Be'lakor, emisario oscuro.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_original: The Truthsayers listen. Speak the truth and we'll decide.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_translated: Los Arúspices escuchan. Se honesto y decidiremos.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_original: The mists parted and, like the storms, you flood our land. Speak.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_translated: Las brumas se han abierto y, como las tormentas, ha inundado nuestra tierra. Habla.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_original: May you have warm words on this cold evening
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_translated: Que tengas palabras cálidas en esta fría noche

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_original: The druid council welcomes you, dear friend.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_translated: El consejo druida, te da la bienvenida querido amigo.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_original: May you live as long as you want, and never want as long as you live!
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Gree.value_translated: ¡Que vivas todo el tiempo que quieras mientras puedas!

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_original: We require help. The wards falter.
There is a storm coming. Help us weather it.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_translated: Se acerca una tormenta. Ayúdanos a capearla.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_original: As we trust the giants, will you trust us?
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_translated: Como confiamos en los gigantes, ¿confiarás en nosotros?
Un regalo para facilitar las relaciones.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_original: We know of the stories about the treasures of Albion.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_translated: Conocemos las historias sobre los tesoros de Albión.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_original: What remains of many shipwrecks. Take it back.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_translated: Lo que queda de los muchos naufragios. Tomad lo que es vuestro.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_original: The White Cliffs need defending. Will you aid us?
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_translated: Los Acantilados Blancos necesitan ser defendidos. ¿Nos ayudarás?

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_original: The Ogham stones topple. Help us right them.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_translated: Las piedras Ogham se derrumban. Ayúdanos a repararlos.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_original: Darkness clouds the druids' minds. Something is coming…
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_translated: Una oscuridad nubla las mentes de los druidas. Algo se acerca...
Esta lucha no beneficia a nadie.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_original: The ancient enemy benefits from this. Let us have peace.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Offe.value_translated: El antiguo enemigo se beneficia de esta situación. Tengamos paz.
La guerra nos debilita a todos.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: What would we possibly stand to gain? We have all we need here in Albion.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: ¿Qué podríamos ganar? Tenemos todo lo que necesitamos aquí en Albión.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: Our ways are not your ways. We cannot possibly join together.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: Nuestros caminos no son los tuyos. Posiblemente no podamos unirnos.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: Only the Truthsayers may know our secrets. No outsiders shall learn them.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: Solo los Arúspices pueden conocer nuestros secretos. Ningún extraño los aprenderá.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: Such an affront cannot be resolved with mere words.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: Tal afrenta no se puede resolver con meras palabras.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: We beat our swords upon our shields. To no beast or man shall we yield to.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: Golpeamos nuestras espadas sobre nuestros escudos. No cederemos ante ninguna bestia o hombre.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: Those who lay with mangy dogs will wake up with fleas. We refuse.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: Aquellos que se acuestan con perros sarnosos se despertarán con pulgas. Nos negamos.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: May the swamps take you for this insult!
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: ¡Que los pantanos te lleven por este insulto!

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: Get out, before we loose the hounds!
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: ¡Fuera, antes de que soltemos a los mastines!

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: We have no need of you "civilised" people.
It's a good deed to forget a bad joke.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: Es una buena acción olvidar un mal chiste.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: I have read the birds flight. This offer stands under a bad omen.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: He leído el vuelo de los pájaros. Esta oferta está bajo un mal augurio.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: Choteich, the sun god, requires us to choose another way.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: Choteich, el dios del sol, nos exige que elijamos otro camino.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_original: Unfortunately, we can’t agree to that.
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_Reje.value_translated: Desafortunadamente, no podemos estar de acuerdo con eso.

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_War_.value_original: The auguries speak of war! We rally our people to defend our homeland!
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_War_.value_translated: ¡Los augurios hablan de guerra! ¡Unimos a nuestra gente para defender nuestra patria!

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_War_.value_original: We see the mark of Chaos upon you! For the sake of the world, you must be stopped!
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_War_.value_translated: ¡Vemos la mancha del Caos en ti! ¡Por el bien del mundo, debes detenerte!

diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_War_.value_original: Dark Emissaries have whispered lies to you. You aid Chaos without even realising it. No more!
diplomacy_strings_string_Albion_Dip_War_.value_translated: Los Emisarios Oscuros te han susurrado mentiras. Ayudas al Caos sin siquiera darte cuenta. ¡Eso se acabó!

diplomacy_strings_string_personality_des.value_original: This character seeks to bring death to the Ruinous Powers for defiling the island of Albion. They will seek to conquer and purify any land corrupted by the Dark Gods, and will seek grievous revenge against all those who cross them.
This character seeks to protect the island of Albion from the predations of Chaos at all costs. They will seek allies and defend their own settlements to the last warrior.

effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_original: We must uncover the Waystones scattered throughout Albion, though it will attract things of evil and chaos to our island. But this is our duty and responsibility to the world.
effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_translated: Debemos descubrir los Círculos de Piedras esparcidos por toda Albión, aunque atraigamos el mal y el Caos a esta isla, es necesario si queremos salvar este mundo.

effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_original: We have uncovered all the Waystones on Albion. They must be rebuilt urgently if the world is to overcome the End Times.
effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_translated: Hemos descubierto todos los Círculos de Piedras en Albión. Deben ser reconstruidos urgentemente si el mundo quiere superar el Fin de los Tiempos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_original: Restoration of the Albion waystones is underway! Dark things stir in anger as chaos energy is siphoned from the world.
effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_translated: ¡La restauración de los Círculos de Piedras de Albión está en marcha! Las cosas oscuras se revuelven con rabia mientras la energía del caos es desviada del mundo.

effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_original: Through the restoration of the Albion waystones network we have forever weakened chaos and its servants in this world.
effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_translated: A través de la restauración de la red de los Círculos de Piedras de Albión hemos debilitado para siempre el Caos y a sus siervos en este mundo.

effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_original: Chaos is weakened irreparably due to your stalwart actions, a true bastion against evil, the forces of order bow to you.
effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_translated: El Caos se ha debilitado irremediablemente gracias a tus incondicionales acciones, un verdadero bastión contra el mal, las fuerzas del orden se inclinan ante ti.

effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_original: This grizzly banner is a reminder of the more savage aspects of the culture of Albion. It is decorated with skulls and bones of slain foes, both beast and human alike.
effect_bundles_localised_description_alb.value_translated: Este grisáceo estandarte es un recordatorio de los aspectos más salvajes de la cultura de Albión. Está decorado con calaveras y huesos de enemigos muertos, tanto bestias como humanos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_anc.value_original: Only in times of war would hunters bother to carry a banner.
effect_bundles_localised_description_anc.value_translated: Sólo en tiempos de guerra los cazadores se molestan en llevar un estandarte.

effect_bundles_localised_description_anc.value_original: A magic banner emblazoned with the sign of the Triskele. It is given to accomplished Truthsayers and its magic will protect them from harm.
effect_bundles_localised_description_anc.value_translated: Un estandarte mágico con el símbolo del Triskele. Se entrega a los Arúspices consumados y su magia los protege de cualquier daño.

effect_bundles_localised_description_anc.value_original: Those who fight under the Banner of the Earth goddess benefit from her protection.
effect_bundles_localised_description_anc.value_translated: Los que luchan bajo el estandarte de la diosa de la Tierra se benefician de su protección.

effect_bundles_localised_description_dur.value_original: The chariots built in Albion might look crude to more civilized folk, but they are well constructed and surprisingly dangerous on the field.
effect_bundles_localised_description_dur.value_translated: Los carros construidos en Albión pueden parecer toscos para la gente más civilizada, pero están bien construidos y son sorprendentemente peligrosos en el campo de batalla.

effect_bundles_localised_description_dur.value_original: Albion bred warhorses are hardy, fast and sure-footed. However, only wealthy warriors can afford to ride on to battle.
effect_bundles_localised_description_dur.value_translated: Los caballos de guerra criados en Albión son resistentes, rápidos y seguros. Sin embargo, sólo los guerreros adinerados pueden permitirse montarlos en la batalla.

effect_bundles_localised_description_elo.value_original: One of the last functioning artifacts of the Old Ones remaining in the hands of the tribes of Albion, this amulet can save the life of its wearer once per battle with a surge of magical energy.
effect_bundles_localised_description_elo.value_translated: Este amuleto, uno de los últimos artefactos funcionales de los Ancestrales que quedan en manos de las tribus de Albión, puede salvar la vida de su portador una vez por batalla con una oleada de energía mágica.

effect_bundles_localised_description_elo.value_original: When Dural Durak casts spells, this staff of his own creation twists the Winds of Magic in a way that disturbs the efforts of enemy casters.
effect_bundles_localised_description_elo.value_translated: Cuando Dural Durak lanza hechizos, este bastón de su propia creación retuerce los Vientos de la Magia de forma que perturba los esfuerzos de los hechiceros enemigos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_original: Dural Durak arrives to lead your armies!
Morrigan the Phantom Queen arrives to lead your armies!
effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_translated: ¡Morrigan, la Reina Fantasma llega para liderar tus ejércitos!

effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_original: Albion only has resources to commit to a single Waystone restoration at a time.
effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_translated: Albión sólo tiene recursos para comprometerse con la restauración de un solo Círculo de Piedras a la vez.

effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_original: Old Man Carnuos, the God of the Hunt favours the stag. His woad confers hunters the ability to meld with their surroundings, but makes them extremely vulnerable to fire.
Mhorrinion the Ravenqueen, Daughter of Death, favours the crow. Her woad grants warriors great speed and the ability to cause terror on their foes. at the cost of their physical protection.
Cailledh the Crimson, Goddess of Warriors, favours the boar. Her woad grants extra protection, but makes warriors lose themselves in battlerage.
Choteich of the Long Arm favours the sun. His woad grants flaming attacks and makes warriors bolder, but it also makes them proud and haughty, more demanding of riches and glory.

Durak shores up his warriors resolve in battle through magic and tactics though he is vulnerable in extended combat he can prove quite deadly atop his chariot. Mhorriníon's unmatched affinity with magic is best suited to the restoration of the Waystones.
effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_translated: Durak refuerza la determinación de sus guerreros en la batalla a través de la magia y las tácticas, aunque es vulnerable en los combates prolongados, puede resultar bastante letal sobre su carro. La incomparable afinidad de Mhorriníon con la magia es la más adecuada para la restauración de los Círculos de Piedras.

effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_original: The Murder-Queen will strike fear into our enemies hearts with her magic, but atop her raven must prove elusive and keep away from danger. The most wise Durak can see to the Waystones tumultuous repair.
effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_translated: La Reina Cuervo infundirá miedo en los corazones de nuestros enemigos con su magia, pero sobre de su cuervo debe ser esquiva y mantenerse alejada del peligro. El más sabio de los Durak puede encargarse de la convulsa restauración de los Círculos de Piedras.

effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_original: In years past Albion has sacrificed itself for the benefit of the rest of the world, siphoning the winds of magic into their very soil, poisoning and twisting the former paradise into a dangerous, bleak parody of itself. Yet the Truthsayers still guard the sacred sites of the Old Ones, biding their time to restore them.
effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_translated: En años pasados, Albión se ha sacrificado en beneficio del resto del mundo, desviando los vientos de la magia hacia su propio suelo, envenenando y retorciendo el antiguo paraíso en una peligrosa y sombría parodia de sí mismo. Sin embargo, los Arúspices aún custodian los lugares sagrados de los Ancestrales, esperando su momento para restaurarlos.

effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_original: "Let Dural Durak and his Truthsayers cower in Albion, I will take war and fury to the Runious Powers themselves! Their servants shall suffer for the defilement of Albion, and they shall never find peace iny my father's realm!"
effect_bundles_localised_description_ovn.value_translated: "Deja que Dural Durak y sus Arúspices se agazapen en Albión, ¡llevaré la guerra y la furia a los propios Poderes Runiosos! Sus siervos sufrirán por la profanación de Albión, ¡y nunca encontrarán la paz en el reino de mi padre!"

effect_bundles_localised_description_rho.value_original: The Ravenqueen Host is naturally supported by the Raven-Queen's own Household on Albion, who will help supply reinforcements.
The Ravenqueen Host is supported by the Petty Cheiftains of Albion, who will do what they can to supply reinforcements.
The Ravenqueen Host has the support of the Overkings of Albion, who will ensure you receive veteran warriors from the homeland.
The Ravenqueen Host has the full backing of the Council of Truthsayers. The most elite warriors of the Albion clans will be sent to support you.
The Ravenqueen Host's exploits are spoken of in every hut and across every campfire's in Albion - its warriors will be known as legendary folk-heroes!
The Ravenqueen Host has proven beyond doubt to be Albion's most elite force, carrying out Mhorrinion's will with unrelenting fortitude to vanquish Chaos – and it will continue to do so!
The Chaos gods have very little interest in the Ravenqueen's exploits.
The eyes of Chaos give you but a fleeting glance.
The eyes of Chaos are starting to take notice of you.
Lowly Warlord's and Marauder Chieftain's seek you out to gain petty boons from the Dark Gods.
Lords of Chaos seeking glory and daemonhood come to hunt and flay you.
The eyes of chaos gaze upon you, they see a worthy challenge and set forth the Champions of Chaos!

effect_bundles_localised_description_wh2.value_original: There is much to learn from the ancient ways of the Old Ones.
Once a fur-clad savage, always a fur-clad savage. It takes little to break a man’s will, and even less to confine him.

effect_bundles_localised_title_ovn_albio.value_translated: Restauración de los círculos de piedras

effects_description_chaos_attrition_immu.value_translated: Inmune al desgaste por Corrupción del Caos

effects_description_cooldown_truth_wings.value_translated: Tiempo de espera: %+n% para Alas del Destino

event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_original: The Truthsayers have foreseen dark forces landing on Albion soil! Prepare the defences!
event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_translated: ¡Los Arúspices han previsto el desembarco de fuerzas oscuras en suelo de Albión! ¡Preparad las defensas!

event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_original: Dark Emissary forces to the North!
event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_translated: ¡Fuerzas de los Emisarios Oscuros al Norte!

event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_original: Dark forces muster to the north! Prepare the defenses, we shall beat them back from the Citadel! We will never fall to their dark and twisted plans.
event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_translated: ¡Las fuerzas oscuras se reúnen en el norte! ¡Preparad las defensas, los derrotaremos expulsándolos de la Ciudadela! Nunca caeremos en sus oscuros y retorcidos planes.

event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_original: Dark Emissaries forces at the Mainland!
event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_translated: ¡Fuerzas de los Emisarios Oscuros en el Continente!

event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_original: Dark Emissary forces to the South!
event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_translated: ¡Fuerzas de los Emisarios Oscuros al Sur!

event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_original: Dark forces sighted on the southern shores! Their lay their greedy eyes on the Isle of Wights!
event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_translated: ¡Las fuerzas oscuras han sido avistadas en las costas del sur! ¡Sus codiciosos ojos se han posado en la Isla de los Tumularios!

event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_original: Dark forces prepare to ravage our Capital! They seek to use its power for their own dark and twisted purposes.
event_feed_strings_text_ovn_event_feed_s.value_translated: ¡Las fuerzas oscuras se preparan para devastar nuestra Capital! Pretenden usar su poder para sus propios oscuros y retorcidos planes.

factions_attack_desc_ovn_alb_bol_a_hat.value_translated: ¡Estás atacando a los Clanes de Bol-A-Hat!

factions_attack_desc_ovn_alb_carn_mallog.value_original: You are attacking the Highlanders of Carn Mallog!
factions_attack_desc_ovn_alb_carn_mallog.value_translated: ¡Estás atacando a los Montañeses de Carn Mallog!

factions_attack_desc_ovn_alb_dark_emissa.value_original: You are attacking the Dark Emissaries!

factions_attack_desc_ovn_alb_host_ravenq.value_original: You are attacking the Host of the Ravenqueen!
factions_attack_desc_ovn_alb_host_ravenq.value_translated: ¡Estás atacando a la Hueste de la Reina Cuervo!

factions_attack_desc_ovn_alb_order_of_th.value_original: You are attacking the Truthsayer Council!

factions_attack_desc_ovn_alb_rebel.value_original: You are attacking the Albion Rebels!
factions_attack_desc_ovn_alb_rebel.value_translated: ¡Estás atacando a los rebeldes de Albion!

factions_defend_desc_mixer_alb_albion_du.value_original: You are defending against the Albion!

factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_bol_a_hat.value_original: You are defending against the Bol-A-Hat Clans!
factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_bol_a_hat.value_translated: ¡Te estás defendiendo de los Clanes de Bol-A-Hat!

factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_carn_mallog.value_original: You are defending against the Highlanders of Carn Mallog!
factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_carn_mallog.value_translated: ¡Te estás defendiendo de los Montañeses de Carn Mallog!

factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_dark_emissa.value_original: You are defending against the Dark Emissaries!
factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_dark_emissa.value_translated: ¡Te estás defendiendo de los Emisarios Oscuros!

factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_host_ravenq.value_original: You are defending against the Host of the Ravenqueen!
factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_host_ravenq.value_translated: ¡Te estás defendiendo de la Hueste de la Reina Cuervo!

factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_order_of_th.value_original: You are defending against the Truthsayer Council!
factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_order_of_th.value_translated: ¡Te estás defendiendo del Consejo de Arúspices!

factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_rebel.value_original: You are defending against the Albion Rebels!
factions_defend_desc_ovn_alb_rebel.value_translated: ¡Te estás defendiendo de los rebeldes de Albión!

frontend_faction_leaders_frontend_descri.value_original: Always mercurial and vengeful, Mhorrinion, Daughter of the Death God and Ravenqueen, has assembled a host of zealous tribesmen and set off on a warpath in Norsca, making sure the wretched servants of Chaos pay for their defilement of Albion...
From the Great Ogham of Albion, Dural Durak, first among the Truthsayers, leads the defence of imperilled Albion, for his homeland is besieged by enemies old and new…
Thirsting for revenge after the recent devastation caused to Albion by Chaos, Mhorriníon and some of her most fervent followers have decided to take war to the very home of the Ruinous Powers...
frontend_faction_leaders_frontend_descri.value_translated: Sedientos de venganza tras la reciente devastación provocada en Albión por el Caos, Mhorriníon y algunos de sus más fervientes seguidores han decidido llevar la guerra al propio hogar de los Poderes Ruinosos...

frontend_faction_leaders_frontend_descri.value_original: Having ousted the Dark Master from the Citadel of Lead, Dural Durak prepares to clear the island of remaining Chaos invaders and rebuild the Ogham Stones, bringing Albion in alignment with the Plan....
frontend_faction_leaders_frontend_descri.value_translated: Tras expulsar al Maestro Oscuro de la Ciudadela de Plomo, Dural Durak se prepara para limpiar la isla de los invasores del Caos restantes y reconstruir las Piedras Ogham, alineando a Albión con el Plan....

frontend_factions_localised_mechanics_ov.value_original: [[img:bullet_chs_corruption]][[/img]]The tribes of Albion have repelled the mark of Chaos but their lands have not. incidents_localised_description_rhox_alb.value_original: Due to politicking at home, a surge of warriors have volunteered to join your worthy cause.
Due to politicking at home, a surge of warriors have volunteered to join your worthy cause.
Due to politicking at home, a surge of warriors have volunteered to join your worthy cause.

Following your recent military aggression, the forces of Chaos have started to gather in numbers and are priming their forces seeking boons from the Chaos Gods. An attack is imminent…\\n\\n[[col:red]]A Chaos horde has appeared![[/col]]

The Ravenqueen Host has increased its level of Belief among the folk of Albion, making great strides towards fulfilling Mhorrinion's mission. You will now receive better-quality Clan Reinforcements.\\n\\nContinue your success, garnering Belief to advance the Ravenqueen Host progress and further the Mhorrinion's cause.
The Chaos Gods grow bored of you – hostility against the Ravenqueen Host has now returned to normal levels. Clan Reinforcements will now be dispatched at regular frequency.
Your military activity has heightened the enemy’s aggression towards the Ravenqueen Host, increasing the hostility level. Clan Reinforcements will now be dispatched more often.

incidents_localised_description_rhox_alb.value_original: The Ravenqueen Hosts relentless aggressions have caused hostility to rise to deadly levels – the forces of Chaos are now concentrating their efforts against you! With urgency Clan Reinforcements have already been dispatched.
